history.proof: split. - intros H. split. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: Forall_cons, Forall_inv, Forall_inv_tail. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: Forall_cons, Forall_inv, Forall_inv_tail. - intros [H1 H2]. sfirstorder depth: 3use: Forall_cons, Forall_inv, Forall_inv_tail.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros X P x ll. split. - intros H. split. + apply (Forall_inv P x ll H). + apply (Forall_inv_tail X P x ll H). - intros [H1 H2]. apply (Forall_cons X P x ll). + apply H1. + apply H2.
